title: Book Review: Exterminate/Regenerate - The Story of Doctor Who by John Higgs ★★★★☆
summary: The problem with fans is that we want to know everything. What did Lennon eat for breakfast the day he recorded Imagine? Which colour pencil did the script editor use on our favourite episode of Doctor Who? Did the costume designer on Buffy secretly sneak in Masonic references in that extra's shirt?!?!  There's no trivia so obscure that it won't be referenced somewhere, debated endlessly, and…
